**Call for Proposal: Senior Mentors for National Security Programme**

**Reference Number:** WS4408575874-Doc4511956133

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Fernandez, Allison
* Email: [allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:allison.fernandez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19247979?extsite=MTkyNDc5NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19247979?extsite=MTkyNDc5NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Notice Details:**

* **Title:** Request for Proposal (RFP) for Senior Mentors
* **Publication Date:** 2024-03-28
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-29 (02:00pm EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-07-01
* **Duration:** 2 years with an option to extend for 2 additional 1-year periods

**Summary:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires up to 20 qualified Senior Mentors to provide mentoring services to the Canadian Forces College for a period of 2 years. The services are to be provided on an "as and when requested" basis via TA Form 626. The offeror must be able to demonstrate expertise in their respective field and provide a high level of mentoring services.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The selection of the Senior Mentors will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The evaluation will be conducted in accordance with the these terms of reference.

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is covered by the following trade agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
